mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into file (user_id, session_id, folder_id, file_name, file_path, file_size, is_image, image_width, image_height, upload_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sessionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{folderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isImage,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{imageWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imageHeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update file set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, session_id = #{sessionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, folder_id = #{folderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_image = #{isImage,jdbcType=TINYINT}, image_width = #{imageWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, image_height = #{imageHeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, upload_time = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, session_id, folder_id, file_name, file_path, file_size, is_image, image_width, image_height, upload_time from file where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, user_id, session_id, folder_id, file_name, file_path, file_size, is_image, image_width, image_height, upload_time from file
